title: Neweb.ai Landing Page
description: A modern and responsive landing page built for Neweb.ai, designed with smooth animations, interactive UI, and optimized for performance.

title: MakeMyTrip Clone
description: A travel booking platform clone built with React.js, Material UI, and Context API. Includes booking functionality for flights, trains, hotels, search/filter, and authentication.

title: Course Selling E-Commerce App
description: A full-stack MERN course selling platform with authentication, Stripe payment integration, admin dashboard, and cloud storage for media.

title: MovieDB Project
description: A React application that fetches movies from TMDb API with features like search, pagination, top-rated, popular, upcoming movies, and single movie details page.

title: Pokémon App
description: A fun React app that fetches Pokémon data using the PokéAPI with features like search, Pokémon details, and responsive design.

title: YouTube Clone
description: A YouTube-like application built with React.js where users can browse, search, and play videos fetched via APIs.

title: Task Manager App
description: A JavaScript-based task manager application with CRUD functionality, allowing users to add, edit, and delete tasks.

title: Simplotel HTML-CSS Assignment
description: A responsive web page built with pure HTML5 and CSS3 as part of a frontend assignment. Focused on layout, typography, and responsive design without using frameworks.
